attributes.action: ensure that all religious education in schools is informative but non doctrinal. That it is there to enable young people to make informed opinions and not bed led by every fanatical view from one side or the other.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Religious education is so often confused with worship and indoctriation. It should be neither. It is attacked by fundementalists of all religions and by fundementalist athieists also. It can be and should be a subject of meaningful study to help all pupils to make life decisions on the basis of informed study and analysis.
